definitions.definition: The act of circumscribing or the quality of being circumscribed.
Anything that circumscribes or a circumscribed area.
The definition of what does and does not belong to a given taxon , from a particular taxonomic viewpoint or taxonomic system .
examples: The circumscription in the APG system of the family Malvaceae includes the former families Bombacaceae , Sterculiaceae and Tiliaceae .

definitions.definition: An electoral district ; used often in texts treating electoral systems in Romance countries.

main_definition: The act of circumscribing or the quality of being circumscribed.
secondary_definitions: Anything that circumscribes or a circumscribed area.
( taxonomy ) The definition of what does and does not belong to a given taxon , from a particular taxonomic viewpoint or taxonomic system .
An electoral district ; used often in texts treating electoral systems in Romance countries.
